elements.name: User logs in and adds a product from the lowest-rated seller to the cart

steps.name: The user visits the Trendyol website
The user logs in with valid credentials
The user filters the price between 15000 and 20000 TL
The user selects a random product from the bottom of the list
The user adds the product from the lowest-rated seller to the cart
The product should be visible in the cart

name: Adding a product to the cart on Trendyol
